H0.text: The town of Vittoria and the city of Ragusa can be found on which island. Sardinia

H1.text: The town of Vittoria and the city of Ragusa can be found on which island. Corsica

H2.text: The town of Vittoria and the city of Ragusa can be found on which island. Malta

H3.text: The town of Vittoria and the city of Ragusa can be found on which island. Sicily

A4.text: Ragusa is a major city in Sicily
